NoHintsFound.name: No hint found
NoHintsFound.message: Woops! This puzzle is hard, and no hint was found, sorry! A random cell can be revealed instead.

EliminationGeneric.name: Elimination
EliminationGeneric.message-1-single-target: There is a @:{rowOrColumn} on the board where the correct @:{symbolOrColor} of a cell can be deduced by eliminating impossible combinations.
EliminationGeneric.message-1-multiple-targets: There is a @:{rowOrColumn} on the board where some correct moves can be deduced by eliminating impossible combinations.
EliminationGeneric.message-2-single-target: In this @:{rowOrColumn}, one cell can only ever contain one @:{symbolOrColor}, because it would otherwise result in an invalid @:{rowOrColumn}.
EliminationGeneric.message-2-multiple-targets: In this @:{rowOrColumn}, some cells can only ever contain one @:{symbolOrColor}, because it would otherwise result in an invalid @:{rowOrColumn}.
EliminationGeneric.message-3-single-target: This cell can be deduced by eliminating impossible combinations of the remaining @:{symbolOrColorPlural} to be placed.
EliminationGeneric.message-3-multiple-targets: These cells can be deduced by eliminating impossible combinations of the remaining @:{symbolOrColorPlural} to be placed.

Triples.name: Triples
messages: There is a @:{subType} somewhere on the board.
Three @:{sourceSymbol} cannot be next to each other. Therefore, the adjacent @:{cellOrCells} can only possibly be one @:{symbolOrColor}.

messages.pair: Two equal @:{symbolOrColorPlural} (@:{source}) are next to each other. That means @:{surroundingCells} must be @:{target}.
messages.sandwich: An empty cell is surrounded by two of the same @:{symbolOrColor}. To prevent three equal @:{symbolOrColorPlural} in a row, the empty cell must be @:{target}.

Balance.name: Balanced Lines
Balance.message-1: There is a @:{rowOrColumn} on the board that can be balanced.
Balance.message-2: This @:{rowOrColumn} requires an equal amount of each @:{symbolOrColor}, and all @:{sourceSymbols} have been placed.
Balance.message-2-odd: This @:{rowOrColumn} requires {reqZero} @:{zeros}, and {reqOne} @:{ones}, and all @:{sourceSymbols} have been placed.
Balance.message-3-single-target: To balance this @:{rowOrColumn} so that it contains {reqZero} @:{zeros} and {reqOne} @:{ones}, a @:{target} must be placed in this cell.
Balance.message-3-multiple-targets: To balance this @:{rowOrColumn} so that it contains {reqZero} @:{zeros} and {reqOne} @:{ones}, @:{targets} must be placed in these cells.

IncorrectValues.name: Mistakes
IncorrectValues.message-2: The highlighted cells are incorrect. You can automatically remove these mistakes, or manually fix your mistakes yourself.
